info.title: Content Site Backend
info.description: API for content site with media streaming

post.description: Login and return a JWT token.
Create a new post with media uploaded to GCore.

schema.title: Response Get Posts Content Posts Get
Response Delete Post Content Posts  Post Id  Delete

post.description: Create a comment on a post.

schema.title: Response Get Comments Content Posts  Post Id  Comments Get

Response Like Post Content Posts  Post Id  Like Post
Response Get User Subscriptions Subscriptions  Get
Response Get User Payments Payments  Get
Response Get Discounts Payments Discounts Get

get.description: Retrieve users with optional subscription level filter.
